Allen.Parker, Texas:
Parker is a city in Collin County, Texas, United States. The population was 3,811 at the 2010 census.


== Geography ==
Parker is located in southern Collin County at 33°03′25″N 96°37′17″W. It is bordered to the north by Allen, to the west by Plano, to the south by Murphy, to the southeast by Wylie, and to the northeast by Lucas.
